title: Did Dolly Barton say: " Is it really better in one year of Bush 16 years, Obama together? '
subtitle: Celebrities say the worst things, especially when it comes to politics! Or are they? Sometimes they do, sometimes they don't.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: == sync, corrected by elderman == @elder_man (Singer Dolly Parton) (or actor Michelle Pfeiffer) said that "Trap in one year is already better than 16 years than Bush and Obama together."
